title: Facebook Gears Up for a Big Augmented Reality Push in 2021
text: The social media leader could be a big winner in this potentially explosive new technology.

title: Kim Kardashian and other celebrities freeze social media accounts to protest hate speech
text: Kim Kardashian West froze her Instagram and Facebook pages on Wednesday in protest of hate speech and misinformation — and she's not alone. Yahoo Finance's Alexandra Canal joins Zack Guzman to break down the latest.

title: FTC prepping possible antitrust suit against Facebook: Reports
text: Yahoo Finance's Editor-in-Chief Andy Serwer, Seana Smith, Myles Udland and Ines Ferre discuss the Wall Street Journal report that the FTC is investigating Facebook over antitrust concerns and prepping a possible lawsuit against Facebook.

title: Facebook is threatening to block news-sharing on its platform in Australia
text: Facebook is threatening to block news-sharing on its platform in Australia in protest of a proposed new law, while companies are opting to rent equipment instead of buying it outright amid current economic uncertainty.

title: Facebook Connect: Oculus event in 10 minutes
text: Facebook's annual Oculus event has a new name: Facebook Connect.

title: Facebook debuts Infinite Office, a virtual reality office space
text: Facebook wants to turn the Quest into more than a gaming device. Today, the company shared early demos of “Infinite Office” a new set of features that will bring solo productivity to the Oculus Quest.

title: Facebook’s Ray-Ban smart glasses are coming in 2021
text:
The social media company and the fashion frames company EssilorLuxottica will team up on glasses that will extend the screen of a smartphone to a pair of glasses. 
The maker of expensive Ray-Ban frames, EssilorLuxottica, and Facebook, the maker of cheap ads, are teaming up to create some fashionable smart glasses.

title: Facebook wants to turn the Quest into a fitness device
text: Facebook is adding a fitness tracker, Oculus Move, to its sweet suite of software for its latest version of the Quest. Announced today as part of the Facebook Connect event outlining the company’s augmented reality and virtual reality plans for the future, the Move fitness tracker is an attempt by Facebook to get in on […]

title: Facebook: FTC preparing possible antitrust lawsuit against company after year long investigation
text: Yahoo Finance's Melody Hahm reports on the Wall Street Journal article which reported the FTC may be preparing a possible antitrust lawsuit.

title: Facebook is launching ‘Project Aria’ AR glasses in 2021
text: At Facebook’s first big event since moving away from the Oculus brand and rebranding its AR and VR efforts as “Facebook Reality Labs,” the company kicked off with some big news. At the fittingly virtual event, Facebook’s Mark Zuckerberg announced that not only will Facebook employees soon to testing Facebook’s own AR glasses prototype, part […]

title: Facebook announces $299 VR headset, due Oct. 13
text: Facebook Inc. FB, -2.99% on Wednesday announced a lighter, cheaper VR headset. The $299 Oculus Quest 2, due Oct.

title: Facebook employees will soon be wearing AR research glasses around town
text:
The employees are gathering data about how the glasses perceive the world and what kind of privacy considerations they may need to make people feel comfortable around them. 
Roughly 100 Facebook employees will soon be wearing augmented reality research glasses at work, at home, and in public in the San Francisco Bay Area and in Seattle.

title: Facebook is officially killing off the Oculus Rift line
text: Facebook is officially killing off the Rift. The company showed off its latest headset at its newly renamed Facebook Connect online event today, but they also revealed that they would be ending sales of the PC-based Oculus Rift S early next year.

title: Review: Facebook’s Oculus Quest 2 is outstanding
text: Facebook’s virtual reality dreams have been a headache for the company. At CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s prodding, the company has spent billions on Oculus and dealt with huge added complexities to their business, while encountering countless issues regarding the company’s founding team, a massive IP lawsuit, crippling supply chain issues and an impossible-to-satisfy user base.

title: Facebook launches a smaller, more powerful Oculus Quest 2 starting at $299 and launching in October
text: At Oculus Connect 7 Facebook Connect today, the company announced a big follow-up to the Oculus Quest and it’s been improved in almost every way. Yes, it’s the same headset as the leaks foretold, but there’s more to be seen.

title: Facebook's Project Aria is test-driving tech for AR glasses on real-world people this year
text: Facebook's full AR glasses are years away, but the road-testing has begun. Its VR and AR VP Andrew Bosworth talks with CNET about AR's future and VR's present.

title: Facebook Oculus Quest 2 Review: Solid V.R. Headset, but Few Games
text: The new $300 virtual-reality headset works well and feels comfortable. But good luck finding games that will keep you entertained.

title: Oculus Quest 2 is better and cheaper... with one Facebook catch
text: The best VR headset also requires you to sign into Facebook.

title: Facebook's latest virtual reality headset is the best yet, but still feels antisocial
text: Facebook on Wednesday announced the Oculus Quest 2 virtual reality headset. It's a successor to last year's Quest and, like that version, doesn't require a computer to run.

title: Zuckerberg: Facebook to release its first pair of smart glasses with Luxottica in 2021
text: Facebook on Wednesday announced a partnership with Luxottica, the maker of Ray-Ban, to release its first pair of smart glasses in 2021.

title: EssilorLuxottica : Facebook and EssilorLuxottica Announce Collaboration for Smart Glasses
text: Facebook and EssilorLuxottica Announce   Collaboration for Smart Glasses

title: Oculus’s new headset is the first real VR rival for Xbox and PlayStation
text:
The newest VR headset from Facebook’s VR group is cheaper and better than its predecessor—and supported by a growing universe of games and other content.
If you’ve been holding out for a reasonably priced, powerful, all-in-one virtual reality headset, the brand-new Oculus Quest 2 may be the one you’ve been waiting for.

title: Oracle Isn’t a Good Fit for TikTok, so Buy Facebook Stock
text: Oracle doesn't know a thing about making a social media app. Facebook does.

title: FTC eyes possible antitrust suit against Facebook, WSJ reports
text: The Wall Street Journal reported that the FTC is preparing a possible antitrust lawsuit against Facebook.

title: Facebook may be facing antitrust lawsuit from the FTC: Report
text: Yahoo Finance's Ines Ferre breaks down the Wall Street Journal report on the potential lawsuit facing Facebook from the FTC.

title: Facebook struggles to delete posts falsely linking activist groups to Oregon fires, report says
text: Social media posts are making baseless claims that activist arsonists are to blame for the deadly fires.

title: Internet stocks like Facebook are overpriced despite 'behind the curve' bullish call, trader says
text: Most of the potential upside for stocks including Facebook, Netflix, Roku and Pinterest is already priced in, said Chantico Global's Gina Sanchez.

title: Facebook addresses political controversy in India, monetization opportunities, startup investments
text: At the beginning of the previous decade, Facebook had a tiny presence in India. It had just started to slowly expand its team in the country and was inking deals with telecom operators to make access to its service free to users and even offer incentives such as free voice credit.
